about_the_game:
Zenkit is a collaborative SaaS platform for project management, database building and more. Follow your data through its entire lifecycle, from fluid brainstorming and research through to a structured system for collaborative use. Zenkit is the flexible workspace you can use to organize anything.

Built by developers, for developers. A home for your entire project. An intuitive system for your entire team to get together and get work done. Regardless of how each individual prefers to work.

Zenkit lets you view and manipulate your data in multiple intuitive ways to gain deeper insight into your projects. Start with a simple list or Kanban board to plan your process, or switch to a table to input additional data and view analytics. Use it to build your own CRM, automated reporting system, or financial planner, or simply save your game builds or plan your next game day. Share your workspaces and assign tasks to your friends and colleagues, and view as much or as little data as you need at any moment. Zenkit helps you to intuitively focus on what’s important.

Hyper-flexible and customizable, Zenkit is a relational database that anyone can use and understand. It is the home for your data and your projects, no matter how big or small, simple or complex. Use Zenkit to cultivate your data and help your development projects flourish.

Key Features:

- Seamlessly switch between Mind map, Kanban, table, list and calendar views
- Works both on and offline
- Available as a mobile app, web app, or desktop app for macOS, Windows or Linux
- 2FA access
- Global Calendar view across all projects
- Keyboard shortcut support
- Zapier integration
